title: EGO
overview: Elif and Erhan are an engaged couple who love each other very much and their biggest expectation from life is to get married and build a happy home. The routine of their lives is disrupted by Erhan's tragic deception and Erhan is faced with a debt that is very difficult to pay. Their lives and psychology will be turned upside down with this news they receive on one of Erhan's business trips. While debt, which is almost impossible to pay, has turned their lives into a nightmare, the offer made by Erhan's boss Sibel will change their lives forever...
